column4: anybody wise in the ways of ubuntu lamp server  who could help me out with a few problems/questions     starting with how to set up multiple domain hosting thru webmin
skip webmin and read the apache docs, they are not too bad
there a better web admin interface instead of using webmin ?
no, the reason that webmin was dropped from ubuntu (and other hosting panels) is because they are security nightmares, and they frequently make troubleshooting a system very difficult
if you do not use a hosting panel, you can find help in #apache and others; if you are using one, you are sort of on your own
:   joy oh joy ..  not the answer i was wanting today =/   ty tho for your answer
